attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Accredited Counsellors provide mental health services with proven clinical outcomes.  We are clinically supervised, insured and are committed to strict ethical standards.  We undertake additional training every year to update our knowledge and refresh skills.  Counselling is not a lifestyle choice, but an essential support for those who need it, at a particular time.  Please acknowledge the role we play in the maintenance of mental health by REMOVING the requirement to add VAT to our fees.
